meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unable to be answered or resolved.
meanings.sent1: The unanswerability of the riddle left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The unanswerability of the question made it challenging for the students.
meanings.sent3: The unanswerability of the joke made it even funnier.
meanings.sent4: The unanswerability of the mystery shrouded the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The unanswerability of the problem lingered in their minds.

meanings.definition: The condition of being impossible to answer or respond to.
meanings.sent1: The unanswerability of the situation left us speechless.
meanings.sent2: The unanswerability of the conundrum baffled the experts.
meanings.sent3: The unanswerability of the request made us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The unanswerability of the dilemma weighed heavily on their minds.
meanings.sent5: The unanswerability of the decision haunted him for days.
